data.name: Path Of Becoming DEMO Demo
data.detailed_description:
Path of Pecoming is a quest-adventure in which you have to go to the mysterious world of the magical Grimoire, where, moreover, magic is unstable. The grimoire was supposed to be an exam test for young magicians, but five of them never returned. And no one is waiting for your appearance in it. Look for a way out, meet unexpected characters, solve riddles, get to the bottom of what happened!

Features:
Manage elemental spells to solve game situations.
Solve mind-blowing puzzles.
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a fairy tale.

data.short_description: Path of Pecoming is a quest adventure in which you have to travel to the mysterious world of the magical Grimoire!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: discrete
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: discrete
